question.Title: Pytest django ModuleNotFoundError: No module named *
question.Body:
What could be the problem, pytest raises - ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'order', but django server runs perfectly

*settings.pyINSTALLED_APPS = [..., "order"]

Structure:

app/ order/ apps.py __init__.py settings.py __init__.py manage.pytests/pytest.ini

It works if use INSTALLED_APPS = [..., "app.order"], how could I use just "order"?
